full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title**
E6MON-23PQFL- Period 07 - Standing Offer for Fresh Fruits and Vegetables

**Reference Number**
WS3971410438-Doc3983416465

**Publication Date**
November 9, 2023

**Closing Date**
December 7, 2023, 14:00 HNE (2:00 PM EST)

**Request for Standing Offer Open**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Correctional Services Canada, and the Department of National Defense invites contractors to submit a standing offer for the purchase of fresh fruits and vegetables. The requested goods are listed in the annex A.

**Tender Requirements**

* Completeness of documents: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the closing date.
* Deficient submissions: All bids submitted after the closing date will be declared non-responsive.

**Contract Details**

* Contract Category: Goods
* Contract Amount: Strictly confidential
* Contract Duration: 2023-11-08 to 2023-11-30
* Regions of Service: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Trade Agreements**
The tender is open to bidders subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**

- Name: Selina Ly
- Email: [selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Department: Department of Public Works and Government Services

**Notice URL**
[Disclaimer: Please make sure to check the authenticity of the notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17966028?extsite=MTc5NjYwMjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Tender Attachments** 
Please refer to the tender notice URL for any associated attachments. ( None available)

Reminders:
* Ensure timely submission of all required documents to avoid a non-responsive bid.
* Review the contract details carefully before submitting your bid.

---

Note: Use the reworded material to draw attention
